title: Advice to a Prophet - "A stone look..." suggests

content.prompt: In the phrase “A stone look on the stone’s face” (line 12), the speaker is suggesting that

choices.label: a stone is the most difficult natural object to comprehend
such a stone is a metaphor for human understanding
it is human beings who attribute meaning to nature
nature is a hostile environment for the human race

skill.text: Skill 6.B: Identify and explain the function of a metaphor.
